content.body: Hey folks! I'd appreciate ideas as to why WATTSI is choking on me in the PR preview of https://github.com/whatwg/html/pull/10269

> <@yoavweiss:matrix.org> Hey folks! I'd appreciate ideas as to why WATTSI is choking on me in the PR preview of https://github.com/whatwg/html/pull/10269 That error is normally due to mismatched start and end tags. But having said that the line it mentions is a `` and from a quick scan I don't see a dangling open `
    `
content.formatted_body:
In reply to @yoavweiss:matrix.org
Hey folks! I'd appreciate ideas as to why WATTSI is choking on me in the PR preview of https://github.com/whatwg/html/pull/10269
That error is normally due to mismatched start and end tags. But having said that the line it mentions is a </ol> and from a quick scan I don't see a dangling open <ol>
